issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I am making use of the google place api service and sometimes when I make the http server call my app breaks and the console logs this information,
libc: Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV) at 0x0000000c (code=1), thread 19738 (KrollRuntimeThr).

ps. this is the first time I am using this site to report an issue so please bear with me if the information is not comprehensive enough. I am willing to provide more information when you ask for it.
thanks.
fields.summary: The app breaks whenever an http network call is made.
fields.environment: I'm building for the android OS with a windows 8 machine

comments.body: We need a simple runnable test case to reproduce this issue. Also, please let us know the Titanium SDK version, Studio version, CLI version you are using.
Resolving this ticket due to lack of information and reporter has not followed up. We would reopen this ticket once we have the requested information to diagnose this issue further.
